For FOXP3 analysis on the protein level , 1 x 106 CD4 + CD25 - cells were lysed and loaded next to a protein - mass ladder ( Magicmark , Invitrogen ) on a NuPAGE 4-12 % bis-tris gel ( Invitrogen ) .
